ai-tha-ap96:1.1_0: I used to be in the past.
ai-tha-ap96:1.2_0: released me from the supreme among men.
ai-tha-ap96:1.3_0: I’ve given robe to my needle case:
ai-tha-ap96:2.2_0: Those who have done nothing wrong,
ai-tha-ap96:2.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap96:3.4_0: The needle cases and burst out.
ai-tha-ap96:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap96:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable S needle case.
ai-tha-ap96:7.1_0: a needle case, a senior monk who was a fourth partridge.
